english.segment1: Oh Lord, You're beautiful. Your face is all I see. And when Your eyes, are on this child. Your grace abounds to me
english.segment2: There is a redeemer, Jesus God's own Son. Precious Lamb of God Messiah. Holy One
english.segment3: Thank You oh my Father. For giving us Your Son. And leaving Your Spirit till. The work on earth is done
english.segment4: Thank You oh my Father. For giving us Your Son. And leaving Your Spirit till. The work on earth is done
